DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate short effect two rehabilitation session commonly perform physical therapy , 1. muscle strengthen low limb 2. effort recondition cyclo ergometer , gait characteristic ( kinematics , kinetics electromyographic ) patient central nervous system lesion .
DOC.brief_title: Short Effects Rehabilitation Session Gait Patients With CNS
DOC.criteria: Male female adult age ≥ 18 year receive motor rehabilitation service Hemiplegia stroke paraplegia incomplete ASIA C D multiple sclerosis ( EPSS < 5 ) . Walking without technical assistance Patients receive signed information inform consent Patient receive physiotherapy session rehabilitation lower limbs Patients able perform entire study Patient safety measure Pregnant woman , breastfeed Patient receive botulinum toxin injection low limb 3 week 2 month prior inclusion study Bilateral Brain damage , cerebellar syndrome , apraxia , severe aphasia Orthopedic complication prevent walk Patients participate clinical study within 3 month prior inclusion • No affiliation social security scheme ( beneficiary assignee )
